channel.title: Help
channel.description:
hey i need some crowns to put on my server for a command how do i add a crown to some1s name based on playerRights?
i want it so it shows a admin symbol for co-owner. so like for a co-owner: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2l8hgz.png[/img]Uno [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2l8hgz.png[/img]Nick <friend [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2l8hgz.png[/img]Ashley <friend
